name: 2022 International Conference on Machine Learning and Intelligent Science
content: For papers submitted to MLIS 2022, we offer the publication as following: Publication in IJMLC. Papers submitted to MLIS will be reviewed by both the conference committees and IJMLC editorial board, and accepted papers will be published in the International Journal of Machine Learning and Computing, which will be indexed by Inspec, Google Scholar, Crossref, CNKI etc.
